Example.name: High rise building 2D
Example.Description: This example applies an inlet condition to the air surrounding a 2D building. The default mesh is made of 4.000 trianglular elements, and the calculation generates results for 800 timesteps. - Size of model: 0.4 MB - Time: Avg calulation time: 2 minutes - Size with results: 250 MB

Example.name: Lid-driven cavity
Example.Description: This example uses a P2-P1 element to simulate the 2D lid-driven cavity flow. - Quadratic mesh
